code: @Override public FileSystem getFileSystem() throws Exception {     org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs = new RawLocalFileSystem().     fs.initialize(LocalFileSystem.getLocalFsURI(), new Configuration()).     return new HadoopFileSystem(fs). }
@Override public Path getBasePath() throws Exception {     return new Path(tmp.newFolder().toURI()). }

comment: /**  * This test needs to be skipped for earlier Hadoop versions because those  * have a bug.  */
code: // ------------------------------------------------------------------------ /**  * This test needs to be skipped for earlier Hadoop versions because those  * have a bug.  */ @Override public void testMkdirsFailsForExistingFile() throws Exception {     final String versionString = VersionInfo.getVersion().     final String prefix = versionString.substring(0, 3).     final float version = Float.parseFloat(prefix).     Assume.assumeTrue("Cannot execute this test on Hadoop prior to 2.8", version >= 2.8f).     super.testMkdirsFailsForExistingFile(). }
